content: 1 ball of hikoo concentric is all it takes to knit this simple poncho a 4 by 4 rib and one seam turns a rectangle into an easy to wear piece that shows off this gradient yarn beautifully yarn 1 ball hikoo concentric 437 yards/200 g 100% baby alpaca sample knit in berry good #1031 gauge 24 sts by 24 row equal 4 by 4 in 4 by 4 rib after blocking needles 5 mm us 8 needles or size needed to obtain gauge notions darning needle finished size length 36 91 5 cm width 21 53 cm
